import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import {getFishesCount, getCrustaceansCount} from "../api/products" import HeaderHome from "./headers/headerHome" import wave1 from "../assets/images/wave1.svg" import wave2 from "../assets/images/wave2.svg" import waveWhite from "../assets/images/wave-white1.svg" import poissons from "../assets/images/poissons.jpeg" import crustaces from "../assets/images/crustacés.jpeg" import saintJacques from "../assets/images/saint_jacques.jpeg" import plateaux from "../assets/images/plateau.jpeg" const Home = (props) => { const [fishesCount, setFishesCount] = useState(0) const [crustaceansCount, setCrustaceansCount] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { getFishesCount() .then(count => { setFishesCount(count) }) getCrustaceansCount() .then(count => { console.log(count) setCrustaceansCount(count) }) }, []) return (

Poissons

Crustacés

Coques

Plateaux

{fishesCount}

Variétés de poissons

{crustaceansCount}

Variétés de crustacés

Mauris scelerisque libero scelerisque, scelerisque mauris et auctor sapien. Sed viverra pharetra nunc facilisis.

) } export default Home
